reviewText:
Would reccomend to be plaid with friends and family alike.

Weapons shoot where their aimed at.
Drivings not floaty for the sake of being realistic and remind me of Twsited Metal in many aspects.
Makes the PC heat up a little but runs smooth and without any hicups.

reviewText: Fun arena-based local multiplayer shooting car game (ABLMSCG wut). Can get pretty chaotic with 4 players but that just adds to the fun as the game is rather fast-paced anyway. Weapons seem balanced enough, oil and flame weapons are really kewl.\n\nWorks well with controllers so console port when

reviewText: Apart from the b-grade sound and look of the thing, it actually plays quite nicely and is pretty good fun. Certainly not the prettiest game, but well worth a play if you're into local multiplayer party games.

reviewText: Ever wanted to run over your friends? This is the right game for it.
